Thank you for your consideration.

conversation.message:
Hi Company_A—Seeker_E again. I understand you’ve declined me in prior rounds, but since you’re the only company still unmatched and you still have an open seat, I’d like to formally apply one more time.

To make this easy and low-risk: if you can share the top 1–2 must-have criteria or the specific gap you’re trying to solve with this hire, I’ll respond with a crisp 1-page plan for my first 10 business days mapped to those outcomes. I’m also happy to do a quick 20–30 minute screen or a short take-home task immediately.

If you’re willing to reconsider, I can commit and start right away. Thank you for taking another look.
